files.name: main.py
files.content:
secretNumber = input ("What is my secret number?")
secretNumber = int (secretNumber)

numberGuess = input ("How many guesses?")
numberGuess = int (numberGuess )
print ("")

counter = 1
promt = "Guess #" + str (counter) + "?"
guess = int (input (promt) )
counter = counter + 1

if (secretNumber == guess):
    print ("Yes!", "The secret number was", secretNumber)
else :
    print ("No, my number is not", guess)
    
    while (counter <= numberGuess):
      promt = "Guess #" + str (counter) + "?"
      guess = int ( input (promt) )
      counter = counter + 1 
      if (secretNumber == guess):
        print ("Yes!")
        break
      if (secretNumber != guess):
        print ("No, my number is not", guess)
    print ("The secret number was", secretNumber)
